 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/896f07f2136347dbd4206c8af8c49604438959379.png> 	

EID AL ADHA HOLIDAY

On the occasion of Eid Al Adha, our UAE offices will be closed from Thursday 5 to Sunday 8 and we will resume work on Monday, 9 June.
Store Consultants and Fulfillment & Distribution Center team members will follow the timings of their malls, stores, and work locations.

Eid Al Adha Mubarak!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Carolina Herrera Outlet Discount

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/ac60c960d636c05c748222911f405fd81205654348.jpg> 	

You are invited to enjoy an exclusive 20% discount at our CH Carolina Herrera Outlet on our Ready-to-Wear and Shoe collections from May 30th - June 1st.

Discover timeless elegance and refined craftsmanship, available for a limited time only.
